title: Brad chroma
body: I was not able to select my bard chroma skin in the new champ select?

replies.body:
Hiya Lebesgue,

Thank you for the report! 

This is one of several issues we'll be addressing with the next patch in regards to the new Champion Select. There's a similar issue with the selection of Ward Skins. In the meantime, the content is still unlocked on your account.
